# Test fbd stats command
fbd init --prefix test

# Create issues
fbd create 'First issue'
cp stdout first.txt
exec sh -c 'grep -oE "test-[a-z0-9]+" first.txt > first_id.txt'

fbd create 'Second issue'

# Close one issue
exec sh -c 'fbd close $(cat first_id.txt)'

# Check stats
fbd stats
stdout 'Total Issues:'
stdout 'Open:'
stdout 'Closed:'
